Package com.joliciel.talismane

Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatedCorpusReader  
    LanguageImplementation
    An implementation of Talismane for a specific language.
    LanguagePackImplementation
    A language implementation which accepts a language pack, meaning a zip file containing various resources describing how to perform analysis for a given language.
    LinguisticRules
    Various generic rules for a given language, indicating via heuristics how to handle different situations.
    NeedsTalismaneSession
    An object which needs a Talismane session assigned to it.
    Talismane
    An interface for processing a Reader from TalismaneConfig.getReader() and writing the analysis result to a Writer from TalismaneConfig.getWriter().
    Not thread-safe: a single Talismane cannot be used by multiple threads simultaneously.
    The output format is determined by the processor corresponding to TalismaneConfig.getEndModule().
    This is accomplished by calling #runCommand(TalismaneConfig), and passing it all the configuration options.
    TalismaneConfig
    An abstract base class for loading, storing and translating configuration information to be passed to Talismane when processing.
    Implementing classes must include language-specific implementation resources.
    The processing must go from a given start module to a given end module in sequence, where the modules available are: Sentence detector, Tokeniser, Pos tagger, Parser.
    There is a default input format for each start module, which can be over-ridden by providing a regex for processing lines of input.
    TalismaneServer
    A Talismane server, for loading all resources up front and processing sentences received on the fly.
    TalismaneService
    A service for returning top-level talismane objects.
    TalismaneSession
    A class storing session-wide reference data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GenericLanguageImplementation  
    GenericRules  
    TalismaneMain
    Direct entry point for Talismane from the command line.
    TalismaneServiceLocator
    Top-level locator for implementations of Talismane interfaces.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Talismane.Command
    The command which Talismane is asked to perform.
    Talismane.Mode  
    Talismane.Module
    A module within the Talismane Suite.
    Talismane.Option  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TalismaneException  

Package com.joliciel.talismane Description

Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
